-- input --
What the ~!@#$%^&*()_+-=`{}|[]\:";',./<>?

+ Line

- Line

* Line

999. Line

## Line
-- gofmt --
What the ~!@#$%^&*()_+-=`{}|[]\:";',./<>?

+ Line

- Line

* Line

999. Line

## Line
-- text --
What the ~!@#$%^&*()_+-=`{}|[]\:";',./<>?

+ Line

- Line

* Line

999. Line

## Line
-- markdown --
What the ~!@#$%^&\*()\_+-=\`{}|\[]\\:";',./\<>?

\+ Line

\- Line

\* Line

999\. Line

\## Line
-- html --

<p>- Line
<p>* Line
<p>999. Line
